title: HEX BLITZ
description: You have two minutes to earn as many points as possible! In this fast-paced, Tetris-style skill game, you need a good eye to complete the puzzles as quickly as you can. Drag the hexagonal pieces to move them and try to fit them into the field. Not all shapes might fit - use hints if you're stuck and collect helpful gifts at the end of the game to boost your next attempt at reaching the highest score!
